liquibase.change.AddColumnChange

liquibase.change.AddColumnChange Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.change.AddColumnChange:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Adds a column to an existing table.

Definition at line 24 of file AddColumnChange.java.

Generates the SQL statements required to run the change.

Parameters:

Returns:
an array of Strings with the statements
Exceptions:
UnsupportedChangeException if this change is not supported by the Database passed as argument
